Topic.Title: Need Help with HTML on Quest

Posts.EditableText: Hi everyone I'm new to Quest (and this forum) and absolutely loooove text adventure games so I had the bright idea that if I like playing them then I would surely enjoy trying to make one...semi true! I love writing the descriptions for each room and object but I am trying to be fancy with my game and would like to make the title red but leave the other sections white but when I put the HTML code in the Game Name bit in the Game Set up section, it shows on the Google Chrome tab when I test it and I don't want it to. Is there anyway I could make the title of my game red without having the HTML code showing on the Google Chrome tab? All help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks guys

Posts.EditableText: Untick "DSisplay title and author when game begins" on the Setup tab of the game object. Then on the Script tab, for te Start Script, select Print a message, and put the title, with the HTML codes, in there.
